CheckTitle: Ensure all Microsoft 365 administrative accounts are cloud-only
Description: This check verifies that all Microsoft 365 administrative accounts are cloud-only, not synchronized from an on-premises directory, by querying administrative accounts and checking their synchronization status.
Risk: On-premises synchronized administrative accounts increase the attack surface and compromise the security posture of the cloud environment.  Compromise of on-premises systems could lead to unauthorized access to Microsoft 365 administrative functionalities.

Code.Other:
1. Identify on-premises synchronized administrative accounts using Microsoft Entra Connect or equivalent tools.
2.  Create new cloud-only administrative accounts with appropriate permissions.
3. Migrate administrative tasks from on-premises synchronized accounts to the new cloud-only accounts.
4. Disable or remove the on-premises synchronized administrative accounts.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure all Microsoft 365 administrative accounts are cloud-only to reduce the attack surface and improve security posture.
